HelpBalloon.title: Include profile field in history
HelpBalloon.content: By activating the profile field history, the original contents of this field are archived when a change (automated or manual) takes place. The profile field historization also allows the change of this field to be used as a campaign trigger (selectable in the start icon) or for a webhook of type "changed profile field".{{ if (max > 0) { }} Please note that you can only activate a maximum of {{- max }} fields for historization. If further fields are required, please contact your account manager.{{ } }}
